amendment.description: Clarifying the availability of highway trust funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3518 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3518 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S7377; text: CR S7377) Clarifying the availability of highway trust funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3518 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
